description.content: Pan Pacific Manila located approximately 100 metres away from Roxas Boulevard and Manila Bay, and is in the popular Malate entertainment district. It is just a few minutes taxi ride away from many tourist destinations such as Rizal Park, Intramuros and Fort Santiago. The hotel is designed to offer comfortable accommodation to business travellers. It has 236 rooms spread across 21 floors, and 7 function rooms and offers all guests a "butler service". The Pacific Lounge encompasses the top floor of the hotel, with floor-to-ceiling glass walls and offering private meeting room, a separate lounge, a dining area, a bar and a rooftop garden with gazebo. There is an outdoor swimming pool and a gym. Intramuros Golf Course is just a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Come and enjoy the wonderful amenities and impeccable service at Pan Pacific Manila.

address.content: M. ADRIATICO CORNER GEN. MALVAR STREETS, MALATE,
